description:
Guy Kawasaki states LinkedIn in one the most untapped Social Media Platforms on the Internet. "Getting Started With LinkedIn" will show you how to harness the power of LinkedIn.

LinkedIn can be the perfect marketing tool for small businesses and independent professionals - if you know what you're doing. That is the key you need to know what you are doing.

Most people just waste time on LinkedIn - browsing randomly and sending out odd connection requests. You can do so much more, and I'm going to show you what exactly in this course.

Getting Started with LinkedIn is delivered in simple easy to follow video tutorials and is just over 2.5 hours in lenght.

If you want to rock it with LinkedIn then this course is designed for you.
title: Getting Started With LinkedIn
